titles.title: Hardest Working Americans Tax Relief Act of 2007
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to exclude overtime pay from gross income.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 8/3/2007--Introduced. Hardest Working Americans Tax Relief Act of 2007 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow individual taxpayers an exclusion from gross income for overtime pay.
